ruleContent.content:
<js>
if( String(chapter.baseUrl).indexOf(Get("url")) !== -1 ){
var document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box");
if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){
        result = "è¯·åˆ·æ–°é‡è¯•æˆ–ç‚¹å¼€ä¸Šæ–¹ç« èŠ‚é“¾æ¥è¿›è¡ŒéªŒè¯";
}
}
else{
newUrl = Get("url") + chapter.url;
chapter.baseUrl = newUrl;
html = java.ajax(newUrl);
document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box");
if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){
        result = "è¯·åˆ·æ–°é‡è¯•æˆ–ç‚¹å¼€ä¸Šæ–¹ç« èŠ‚é“¾æ¥è¿›è¡ŒéªŒè¯";
}
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
let chapters = document.select(".book-chapter a");
let chapterData = [];
let invalidChapterFound = false;

chapters.forEach((item) => {
    let title = item.text();
    let href = item.attr("href");
    let chapterNumberMatch = title.match(/ç¬¬(\d+)ç« /);

    if (!chapterNumberMatch) {
        // æ£€æµ‹åˆ°æ— æ•ˆç« èŠ‚ï¼Œæ ‡è®°ä¸ºä¸åˆæ³•
        invalidChapterFound = true;
    } else {
        let chapterNumber = parseInt(chapterNumberMatch[1], 10);
        chapterData.push({
            number: chapterNumber,
            text: title,
            href: href
        });
     }
});

if (book.getVariable("custom")!=""&&invalidChapterFound==false) {
	   java.toast("ç›®å½•ä¹±åºä¿®å¤å·²å¼€å¯")
    chapterData.sort((a, b) => a.number - b.number);
} else {
    chapterData = []
    chapters.forEach((item) => (chapterData.push({
        text: item.text(),
        href: item.attr("href")
    })));
}
chapterData
</js>
